Description.Text:
Situated in the Royal County of Berkshire, Beech House is one of the finest Hotel in Reading City. It is the perfect haven to relax after a busy day and ideally located for the business or leisure, as it is close to the modern business centres of Reading and the Thames Valley and within easy reach of a host of memorable tourist attractions.

This late Victorian House, once a family home, now offers its guests the comfort and facilities of the twenty first century whilst retaining the elegance of days gone by. The house is set within tranquil grounds with beautifully appointed, individually decorated bedrooms. It has ample on site parking and is well served by public transport bus routes and connected to UK Motorway network via Motorway M4, which is only 2 miles away from Junction 12 and Junction 11.

The Thames Valley and Reading in particular, is one of the most vibrant, forward thinking business centres in the country. Many of the world's biggest computer firms have major offices in Reading as do a host of blue chip companies. It is at the very forefront of business expansion and enterprise in the UK and the World.
Reading has a great deal to offer in the way of cultural, leisure and shopping facilities. It has a modern and cosmopolitan town centre, home to the award winning Oracle shopping centre as well as many specialist shops, a muliplex cinema and theatres. It also boasts the modern Madejski stadium where first class football and rugby take place.
Nearby, a day at the races can be experienced at the famous Windsor, Ascot or Newbury race courses. The Berkshire Downs, Chiltern Hills and the scenery along the River Thames are perfect places to relax and unwind in the country. There are also excellent local golf courses.

EXECUTIVE - GUEST_ROOM - Double Bed Room with Ensuite Power Showers, tea and coffee making facility, trouser press, television and direct dial telephone and Broadband Wifi.
SUPERIOR - ROOM - Spacious Bedrooms with Kingsize beds, writing desks, Wardrobes, Spacious Bathrooms offering Power showers and bathroom amenities. tea and coffee making facility, trouser press, television with satellite channels and direct dial telephone. All of the rooms have been individually decorated and furnished to ensure guests personal comfort. All rooms have Broadband Wifi.
EXECUTIVE - ROOM - Twin Bedroom with two seperate single beds, tea and coffee making facility, trouser press, television and direct dial telephone. All of the rooms have been individually decorated and furnished to ensure guests personal comfort.
